data.name: DivisionCountOutOfRange
data.value: The number of divisions in the tournament must be between {0} and {1}

data.name: DivisionNamesNotUnique
data.value: Divisions can not have the same name

data.name: GameResultOptionalSetScores
data.value: In the set, the number of points for one team must be at least {0} and the points difference should be at least {1}. If the score exceeds {0}, the points difference must be equal to {1}. In case of a technical defeat score of an optional game should be {2}: {3}

data.name: GameResultPreviousOptionalSetUnplayed
data.value: Enter a score of the previous optional game

data.name: GameResultRequiredSetScores
data.value: In the set, the number of points for one team must be at least {0} and the points difference should be at least {1}. If the score exceeds {0}, the points difference must be equal to {1}. In case of a technical defeat score of an optional game should be {2}: {3} or {3}: {2}

data.name: GameResultSameTeam
data.value: The team can not play with itself

data.name: GameResultSetScoresNotOrdered
data.value: The set scores are listed in the wrong order

data.name: GameResultSetsScoreInvalid
data.value: The set score can be one of the following: 3:0, 3:1, 3:2, 2:3, 1:3, 0:3. In case of a technical defeat set score must be {0}:{1} or {1}:{0}

data.name: GameResultSetsScoreNoMatchSetScores
data.value: Game score does not match set scores

data.name: GroupCountOutOfRange
data.value: An amount of groups in division should be between {0} and {1}

data.name: GroupNamesNotUnique
data.value: Group names should be unique

data.name: InvalidTransferEndpoint
data.value: End of the transfer period should be before the end of the tournament

data.name: LateRegistrationDates
data.value: Start of the applying period must be later than today

data.name: TournamentNameMustBeUnique
data.value: Tournament name should be unique

data.name: TransferEndMissing
data.value: If there is a transfer, it's necessary to specify the end date of the transfer period

data.name: TransferStartMissing
data.value: If there is a transfer, it's necessary to specify the start date of the transfer period

data.name: UniqueNameMessage
data.value: Tournament name should be unique

data.name: ValidationDivisionName
data.value: Пожалуйста, введите название дивизиона правильно

data.name: ValidationGroupName
data.value: Пожалуйста, введите название группы правильно

data.name: ValidationPlayerBirthYear
data.value: Пожалуйста, введите дату рождения верно

data.name: ValidationPlayerFirstName
data.value: Пожалуйста, введите имя корректно

data.name: ValidationPlayerHeight
data.value: Пожалуйста, введите рост корректно

data.name: ValidationPlayerLastName
data.value: Пожалуйста, введите фамилию корректно

data.name: ValidationPlayerWeight
data.value: Пожалуйта, введите вес корректно

data.name: WrongRegistrationDatesPeriod
data.value: Start of the applying period must be earlier than its end

data.name: WrongRegistrationGames
data.value: Games should start after the end of the applying period

data.name: WrongStartTournamentDates
data.value: Start of the tournament must be eariler than its end

data.name: WrongThreeMonthRule
data.value: Applying period is less than 3 months

data.name: WrongTransferPeriod
data.value: Start of the transfer period must be earlier than its end

data.name: WrongTransferStart
data.value: Start of the transfer window should be later than the games start
